author: SegmentLinking
body:
This is a fix that follows up on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46802#issuecomment-2506825775. It takes care of the proper initialization/setting of the variable (and homogenizes/cleans up a bit the relevant part of the code).

FYI: @smuzaffar
title: Fix to LST code due to uninitialization of the shiftedRt2 variable
